data.title: Real-time Monitoring Solution for MSG Sphere Studios
data.meta_description: Future Grade delivered a cutting-edge monitoring solution to MSG Sphere Studios for detecting issues on the outer surface of the studio. This advanced monitoring system ensures timely detection of any surface anomalies, enabling prompt corrective action to be taken.
data.meta_site_name: Future Grade - Creative Technology for Broadcast, Brand Experiences & Content Production
data.text:
To ensure comprehensive coverage, our team of of technical engineers installed and integrated 4k IP controlled outdoor PTZ cameras to monitor the Sphere surface and set up a dedicated network infrastructure to control, view, and record the camera feed in real-time. The cameras were strategically installed at the neighboring building at a high altitude, providing complete coverage of the Sphere surface.

Future Gradeâ€™s service also includes 24/7 remote and on-site support to maintain the camera and network infrastructure. Our team of experts is always available to troubleshoot and fix any issues that may arise, ensuring that the Sphere remains in pristine condition.
